name: Twirly Worldy
description:
A relaxing strategy game about rotating hexes into the most advantageous positions.

You have a limited amount of moves to either place down hexes on grass tiles, or rotate around the terrain. Try your best to get as many points as possible through various synergies explained below (or in game of course).

Controls: Very simple.
Simply left-click where you want to place or rotate hexes.
Hold down Right-click and move your mouse to rotate the camera.
Scroll-wheel to zoom in or out.
Escape to either return to main menu or restart the game.

Hexes:

  • Mine: 1 point per adjacent mountain or rocky terrain
  • Smelter: 3 point per adjacent mine
  • Village: 1 point for each adjacent building of any kind
  • Castle: 8 points if surrounded by 4 or more villages
  • Field: 2 points per adjacent water
  • Mill: 1 point per adjacent field of wheat
  • Sheep: 1 point per adjacent sheep or field tile
  • Tower: 1 point per adjacent empty grass or water tile
  • Dock: 10 points if adjacent to at least 3 water tiles

Game Created for Kenney Jam 2021, using the Unity game engine.
